Posts.Content: Good for you!!! I've skipped recommendations...and keeping a watchful eye through blood tests and bone scan...Is the breast cancer estrogen related?
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: Hi Ann...I took Arimidex and am bothered by the effect I feel in my bones...just had a scan done...but in the meantime may I suggest melotonin...it monitors estrogen production; helps sleep, and easily obtainable in the vitimin section.
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: Karen...How are you treating your bone cancer?
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed last August. After a successful lumpectomy, I decided against radiation even though doctors at Sloan Kettering advised it. I have since heard that my decision was a good one from other doctors who also say that radiation should be held out for treatment in recurrence. Is it true that you can only radiate an area one time?
Posts.Title: Radiation
